title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: More population then more pumping becouse country whos population are bigger can print more money without so big risks of inflation...even usa is big finally usa reached point when they cant pump markets much now as usa people feel the results with high inflation.Usa fed done pretty good job well done but now its other countries or zones turn to start connect their money printers with markets party must going on we want 1000x moons.The countries who can help us out we the traders might be the china, russia, india we can drive inflation there by using their currency to pump up the markets also leaders of those can buy assets first such us btc b4 pump and using their currency.Usa is done for now but they done good job and inflation are hitting in usa just now after all those long pumping and money printing years.But now we need asap that new country will quickly take over usa job and start pumping up the markets big time.

comments.author: Moneyprism
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on June 12, 2022, 10:05:10 PMBut now we need asap that new country will quickly take over usa job and start pumping up the markets big time.it's not as easy as it seems,, because nowadays most countries have started to protect their own domestic market.. especially in the current uncertain economic and geopolitical conditions, saving their own domestic market seems to be a priority
